SENT.plain: Five cases of giant thrombosed saccular aneurysms of the cerebral vessels were studied
Three patients had an aneurysm of the middle cerebral artery, one--of the internal carotid artery and one--of the basilar artery
The removal of the aneurysm had a good result in one case, a preoperative neurological defect remained in 2 cases
The clinical picture, diagnosis and the possibilities of surgical intervention in aneurysms of this type are discussed
